  echo: true
---
Import packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in the cleaned study data
```{r}
readRDS('../data/processed/data_imputed.RDS') %>% as_tibble() -> data_imputed
```
## Missingness
```{r}
data_imputed %>% summarise(across(everything(), ~ sum(is.na(.)))) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(),
               names_to = "variable",
               values_to = "n_missing") %>%
  mutate(percent_missing = round(n_missing * 100 / nrow(data_imputed),1))
```
